title: 01/17: Playoff Previews With a 2019 Spin; DFS Plays; Mailbag (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
Jamey Eisenberg, Heath Cummings and Dave Richard look ahead to the AFC and NFC Championship Games, break down the value for Cam Newton with his injured shoulder and answer your emails. ... We start the show with a game called "would you rather have ..." where we debate the 2019 Fantasy value at a specific round for guys still in the playoffs, including Patrick Mahomes in Round 2 vs. Jared Goff in Round 10, Damien Williams in Round 3 vs. Sony Michel in Round 4 and Michael Thomas in Round 1 vs. Julian Edelman in Round 4. ... Cam Newton's shoulder injury leaves his 2019 outlook in question, and we talk about his keeper and dynasty value moving forward (11:15). We also get into the latest news on Leonard Fournette (15:15), as well as new offensive coordinators in Jacksonville, Detroit and Denver (18:00). ... We break down the AFC Championship Game by position (28:00), with a good discussion on trusting Rob Gronkowski against the Chiefs. And we look at the NFC Championship Game by position (39:00), talking about Brandin Cooks vs. Robert Woods against the Saints. The guys also give good buys, bad buys and lineups for FanDuel and DraftKings (48:00), and we answer your emails. ...  Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Fantasy Football, Rookies, Rankings, Waiver Wire
itunes:subtitle: DFS help for the conference championship games, plus plenty of news and a bunch of your emails! What is Cam Newton's future outlook? Are the Jaguars committing to Leonard Fournette?
